title: Integrating Docking, Dynamics, and Assays to Predict Antimicrobial Peptide Interactions with Mycolic Acid Membranes in
abstract: The global burden of multidrug-resistant tuberculosis (MDR-TB) underscores the urgent need for novel therapeutics with distinct mechanisms of action. Here, we report a comparative evaluation of four antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) derived from the amphibian peptide B1CTcu5, integrating experimental validation with molecular modeling to elucidate structure-activity relationships.
